# custom-option



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Custom option element for use with the custom-dropdown element. Acts similarly to the browser's
built in option element. Only to be used inside of custom-dropdown

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                  | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `value`  | `value`   | The value that will emitted when the custom-dropdown changes | `string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event          | Description                      | Type                                             |
| -------------- | -------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `selectOption` | Fired when clicking on an option | `CustomEvent<{ label: string; value: string; }>` |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
